get.description:
Deprecated! Please use V2 version.

Use this endpoint to search for orders. At least a customerId or a shopId should be provided (both can provided in one call as well).

Link-JSON.description: JSON version of the Link header.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

get.description:
Use this endpoint to search for orders. At least a customerId or a shopId should be provided (both can provided in one call as well).

The query parameter "basketId" can contain a comma-separated list of basketIds.

Because of performance reasons the response header "X-Paging-ItemCount" is not always correct. It is only correct on the last page.
This is why you will have to rely on the response-header "Link-JSON" if you want to fetch all results. Only if the "next" properyt of "Link-JSON" is empty, the last page is reached.

Link-JSON.description: JSON version of the Link header.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

get.description: Get cache stats for each item cached.

headerTilroyApiKey.name: Tilroy-Api-Key
headerTilroyApiKey.description: API key to identify and validate the tenant

queryCount.name: count
queryCount.description: max number of items to be returned (default = 10, max = 100)

queryDateFrom.name: dateFrom
queryDateFrom.description: filter results by the date the item was created for export (Deprecated, use dateExportedSince)

queryDateExportedSince.name: dateExportedSince
queryDateExportedSince.description: filter results by the date the item was created for export

queryFields.name: fields
queryFields.description: Comma-separated list of all fields you want returned in the result. All other fields will be omitted.

queryPage.name: page
queryPage.description: page of results to be returned (default = 1)

queryOpen.name: open
queryOpen.description: true for only open order lines.

queryCalculateTotals.name: calculateTotals
queryCalculateTotals.description: query to allow the calculation of all "total" values

sorting.name: sorting
sorting.description: comma-separated list of fields to sort on

queryalwaysCreateNew.name: alwaysCreateNew
queryalwaysCreateNew.description: query to allow the creation of a status even if the status already exists

pathOrderType.name: orderType
pathOrderType.description: Order type. Possible values are "marketplace" and "dropshipment"

mailType.name: type
mailType.description: the type of mail to be sent (must be orderconfirmation or giftvoucher)

collectMethodCode.name: collectMethodCode
collectMethodCode.description: the collect method code to be used, it can be click_collect, home_delivery or service_pickup

Error.description: The error object returned by the service

code.description: Code of the error, assigned by Node or the developer.

message.description: More information about the cause of the error.

LinkedObject.description: (please use lowercase property names. uppercase is deprecated)

tilroyId.description: Reference of the assignee in Tilroy

sourceId.description: reference of the assignee in the source system

Order.description: Order item object returned by the service

status.description: Status of the order line: C = Cancelled, D = Dispatched, I = In transfer, L = Finished, M = Click&Collect confirmed, N = Unreserved, Q = Requested, R = Reserved, S = Sold, X = Not available

OrderExport.description: Order item object returned by the service

OrderDetail.description: Order item object returned by the service

country.description: Description of the country in the correct language

location.description: free text field describing the location

status.description: Status of the order line: C = Cancelled, D = Dispatched, I = In transfer, L = Finished, M = Click&Collect confirmed, N = Unreserved, Q = Requested, R = Reserved, S = Sold, X = Not available

channel.description: When not provided, the default channel code is ECOM

actionId.description: Reference to the action applied to this line

buyAndGetId.description: Reference to the buy and get applied to this line

customerPriceId.description: Reference to the customer price applied to this line. Also known as exceptionalPriceId.

discountReasonId.description: Reference to the discount-reason applied to this line

lineDiscountId.description: Reference to the line discount applied to this line

returnIncentiveId.description: Reference to the return incentive applied to this line

setId.description: Reference to the set id applied to this line

tilroyId.description: Tilroy ID of the payment type

paymentType.description: Payment type object with either tilroyId or code (at least one is required)
